thread.title: CASE MANAGER I/II Conservatorship Unit (I:

title: CASE MANAGER I/II Conservatorship Unit (I:
text:
CASE MANAGER I/II Conservatorship Unit (I: ad date: 10/06/2015 
CASE MANAGER I/II Conservatorship Unit (I: $20.52-$24.95/hr. II: $25.58-$31.11/hr.) needed to provide services for persons on LPS and Probate Conservatorship; arrange and monitor placements / service, including medication /medical services; coordinate w/ federal, state and community agencies, manage financial, legal and personal affairs of persons; & educate family members on legal rights of persons on conservatorship. For detailed job flyer, education and experience requirements, and specific application process please visit http://hr.calaverasgov.us FFD: Apply immediately. Position is open until filled. EOE
